attributes.action: Stop heckling and name calling in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: I feel that childish name calling and heckling are both time wasting and undemocratic as it hampers intelligent disscussion.Voters do not want  their democratically voted MP's drowned out by blustering.Surely grown men and women can have a frank debate without all the silliness and time wasted in bringing the house back into order.Taxpayers deseve better value for money from their elected MPs.
